#summary questionList
#labels free,cms,freecms,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= questionList =
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px"><strong style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px"><em style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">从<span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">FreeCMS 1.2<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span>开始支持</em></strong></p>
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px">根据参数提取评论对象。</p>
<p>
<table style="border-right: medium none; padding-right: 0px; border-top: medium none; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; border-left: medium none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: medium none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="1">

				<p>

				<p>
					说明</p>

		</tr>

				<p>
					id</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">

		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					name</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					名称</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">

					nameLen</p>

				<p>
					名称显示长度</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					selecttype</p>
			</td>

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					order</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">

		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">

					isok</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>

			</td>

</table>
